texts.Categories:DeleteNotAllowedWhenRecipesSt: Category can't be deleted since there are still {RecipeCount} recipes linked to the category.
texts.LongWelcomeMessage: Welcome to the application. This is a startup project based on the ABP framework. For more information, visit abp.io.
texts.Recipes:AtLeastOneIngredientIsRequired: At least one ingredient is required.
texts.Recipes:AtLeastOneStepIsRequired: At least one step is required.
